RawLine: SDRAMA_3103002207,「{color=#FF0000}氣凝天靈{/color}，{color=#FF0000}勻流而下{/color}，{color=#FF0000}似江水狀{/color}。」,「{color=#FF0000}气凝天灵{/color}，{color=#FF0000}匀流而下{/color}，{color=#FF0000}似江水状{/color}。」

Items.r: 「{color=#FF0000}氣凝天靈{/color}，{color=#FF0000}勻流而下{/color}，{color=#FF0000}似江水狀{/color}。」
Items.c: 「氣凝天靈,勻流而下,似江水狀。」
Items.mt: "Qi condenses the heavenly spirit and flows down evenly, like a river.

Items.r: 「{color=#FF0000}气凝天灵{/color}，{color=#FF0000}匀流而下{/color}，{color=#FF0000}似江水状{/color}。」
